tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was an awesome experience for me and my family during my pregnancy journey. Doctor Tanuja is one of the best doctors i have met. She has a super friendly approach towards all her patients from day 1 and I am thankful to her for the treatment and guidance throughout my pregnancy. Oma hospital has excellent facilities and maintains highest standards of hygiene. The staff at the hospital are all highly professional and they put in a lot of effort for every patient. I would definitely recommend Oma hospital for best in class facilities and doctor Tanuja for an awesome medical consultation & treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Thank you so much for the consultation. I have known Dr. Tanuja for almost 23 years, and she is the best gynaecologist one could ask for. She has been treating our family for generations, and we are truly grateful to have her as our doctor. We are so proud of all her achievements and wish her even more success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been visiting doc tanuja for my pcod issues from 2012…after my marriage in the year 2023 i conceived and my pregnancy with my delivery was under her supervision and guidance…my honest review towards the treatment i received is definitely top notch…my pregnancy and delivery was taken care of at every stage with top priority…staff has been helpful and cooperative at every stage…as my pregnancy was high risk had to go in for c-section however i must say i had the best delivery experience with doctor tanuja…i am greatfull and blessed to have her to bring my baby safely delivered…will highly recommend her….

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Let's start with the positive aspects. Initially, they had me fill out a comprehensive form covering topics relevant to my concerns, which I found helpful. I found the hospital to be squeaky clean, well-maintained, and hygienic.

However, the positives were overshadowed by the numerous issues I encountered during my visit. Despite the Practo wait time guarantee, I ended up waiting for over 60 minutes. When I was finally taken in, the doctor spent about 2-3 minutes listening to my issue before leading me to the examination room. The preparation for the exam involved getting undressed and seating on the examination chair. I found myself sitting in a state of undress and waiting on the examination chair for a whole 30 minutes. This left me feeling extremely uncomfortable, embarrassed and anxious as the doctor attended to other patients.

While I did keep on asking for the doctor, I didn't feel comfortable confronting the doctor or staff about the wait when she finally arrived. The doctor finally attended to me and the examination went alright, and I was directed back to the consultation room for further advice. However, upon entering, I found the doctor attending to another patient, which led to another 10-15 minutes of waiting.

Eventually, I did receive attention and I was out within 5 minutes. The entire process from consultation to examination to consultation again took about 2 hours and 15 minutes, while the actual time spent with the doctor was just about 15 minutes.

To top it off, I wasn't provided with any consultation notes initially and had to insist on receiving them. Overall, despite high hopes based on reviews and the clinic's appearance, my experience left much to be desired. 

While I won’t be visiting again, but I hope the doctor and clinic take into account my experience and ensure that other patients don’t go through the same embarrassing and unpleasant ordeal of waiting in a state of undress on the gynecological chair.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I have known Dr Tanuja for more than 30 years now. She is one of the most ************** caring and compassionate doctor. These values are very hard to find in this fast t paced life. She is very patient and explains the pros and cons of any particular situation.  I will always recommend her to anyone known to me.
I had and still have multiple fibroid issues. I had heavy bleeding during periods because of this. At that time any other doctor would have advised hysterectomy. But she told me to bear this for some time till menopause.  And now 10 yrs after my menopause, i still have my uterus intact thanks to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am so thankful to have Dr. Tanuja Uchill as my gynae .
Dr.Tanuja Uchill  is a wonderful person. She listens to the problems very patiently.we have always been very happy with her way of dealing with us(patients). The best part is she remembers the history of the case and gives the best treatment. We are very happy with the Doctor. Everytime we meet Dr .Tanuja Uchill , she asks about our well being, which is so rare for doctors to ask.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Writing this review after exeperiencing 9 Months of hospitality and services. From the inception to the successful delivery of my child. 

We were accustomed to high end hospital of south Mumbai. Apparantely we conceived during April 2020 when  Fear of Covid was at its peak. I was very sceptical  to go to any hospitals and finally decided to look for a nearby "Women only" hospital so that the travel is less and chances of cross contamination is less, after all it was the question of our upcoming child which is more important than our life. Had visited few to check and zero downed to OMA Hospital. Without a second doubt it was the best decision of my life.

OMA hopsital's condition, cleanliness, hygiene and attitude of staff is none less than any top hospitals of Mumbai. During these months several time we had to visit for the usual check ups and not a single time I found a glitch, either in cleanliness, Hygiene, services or breach of any safety check and sops. Each and every staff attitude was very professional without any compromise and with atmost care to the patient.

Post delivery the care given by Nurse to the child and patient is next to a Mother. (Eg. - In wee hour (either its 2 AM or 3 AM) whenever baby cried the nurse came in a fraction of seconds without calling and took care of Baby like mother. This shows the commitment towards their duty and attitude towards the patient and child) 

Coming to the God of this Temple... Dr. Tanuja Uchil.. without any doubt She is the best Gynecologist you can ever have. I will say she was a boon for us during this pandemic. With a very profound knowledge and experience, She has a very positive persona and treat her patients like her own child. Will give quality time to understand and make patients understand the treatments and macro manage each steps to ensure everything goes smooth. (Affirmative: A Genuine Doctor who gives time to Quality) 

In short : If you are looking for a Gynecologist and women hospital with Top quality,  Top hygiene and cleanliness,  Genuine Care, profound experience and a reasonable price : OMA hospital is the answer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: I will definitely refer  her every lady should have an guide like her I Had an Visit for my pregnancy checkup doctor is amazing.. her smiles makes us feel so comfortable and homely.... What an Amazing smile that was which vanishes all our fears towards anything& the way she call us.. and she will only refer to the tests which are most necessary and wonderful guidance and only thing was wait time is long....

tags: Wait time,
review: We have been consulting the Doctor for few months now. Our overall experience has been good. However the wait time is too too high. It always takes more than 3 hours for any consultation or test. The appointment timings given by staff are never adhered to. A one off situation is understood given it’s a hospital, however our experience with respect to delays has always been the same. I would recommend the doctor, however only if you are not a working person and can spend 3 to 4 hours at the hospital on the day of appointment.

I have been visiting her since 5th month of my pregnancy and I would call myself lucky that we found her. You can tell she is quite experienced in Obstetrician department *** ***** ********* *********** *****. She manages her team well and is available 24*7 during last few weeks of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: "I want to express my heartfelt appreciation to my gynaecologist Dr Tanuja Uchil, for the exceptional care and expertise she displayed during my delivery. Her knowledge and compassionate care made a world of difference during this special moment in my life.I would  also like to extend my heartfelt gratitude to the nurses and staff at Oma Hospital.  Their exceptional care and support, both before and after my delivery, made a significant impact on my overall experience. Thank you for an  outstanding dedication to your patients' well-being."

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Doctor is very experienced, she had helped us deliver twin girls. *** ** *** **** ************ ** ******** She gives motherly treatment to her patients. 
Our case was complicated, mcda twins with one baby having reduced blood flow. 
Dr Tanuja was our second doctor as the first doctor scared us so much of twin preganancy due to multiple issues and future complications in mcda twin preganancy.
But Dr Tanuja helped us first release all the stress we had and diagnosed the issues correctly and treated with atmost all the care. 
There are few issues in management but all those can be ignored when u meet such an amazing doctor.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words Ravi and Divya!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a great experience at Oma hospital.I went to Dr.Tanuja during my pregnancy,she gives sufficient time and attention to each of her patient and explains everything in a very simple manner. You will feel very positive and confident after talking to her. She doesn't prescribe unnecessary tests.The hospital is equipped with latest technology, well maintained, spotlessly clean and hygienic.Staff at Oma is friendly, efficient and extremely caring.We are fortunate and lucky to get treatment from a very much experienced Dr like Dr.Tanuja who helped us become proud parents of our little angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Tanuja is so gentle and loving. The moment you enter her cabin to meet her, you feel reassured and taken care of. Inspite of some technical glitches with the equipment,she ensured I was made comfortable, and saw me as soon as soon as the equipment was fixed. The wait time is a little longer, since she gives ample time to each patient and goes through each doubt of the patient.If you are sure you are meeting a doctor who will take care and understand the situation that you are in, a little waiting does not hurt.
Oma Hospital is sparkling clean and staff is friendly
Overall very good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
My 2nd childs delivery was done by Dr. Tanuja in the year 2003, it was a normal delivery and i was pleased by her back then, so after 18 years in 2021 due to some health issues i had to visit a gynac and she was the only person i could rely on for it. And i would like to add that she is not only brilliant in her work, but also as a person. Whoever gets treated under her will be blessed, because of her great experience throughout these years.
God bless Dr. Tanuja Uchil for a brighter future.
Thank you, Oma Hospital.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: * **** *** ** *** ******** ***** ******** ****** *** ******* ******** ***** **** **** ****** *** **** **** **** ** ** ** **** ***** charging much much higher than any high money...the rates of any consultation services do not match with the standard of service offered. I waited from 2.30 to 6.pm litterally how can a pregnant woman in the crisis of corona made to be suffer **** *** **** ** ** ******** *** ****** ******** ** ** **** ** ******* Staff is of more than bad category in terms of providing comfort ,information to waiting patients all they do is chit chatt among themselves and answer your queries with utmost attitude..Also about doctor she is sweet at her words *** **** **** ********* ** ********* ** ** ********* ** ********* ***** ** ********* i was worried but since i change my doctor things went positive for me think before visiting here!
reply_text:
Dear Pushpa,
When you first came to me with a UPT faint positive, we did an ultrasound which did not show a gestational sac. You were asked you do a serum beta hCG test and were asked to repeat it , to know whether it was a delayed conception or the pregnancy was not doing well. 
You were explained the entire situation atleast three times. You still didn’t seem to have comprehended the situation.( or you didn’t want to accept the fact that your pregnancy wasn’t doing well).
You gave a panic call next saying that you were bleeding, truth was,  you had forgotten to do the blood test.  You had to be reminded by the staff and junior doctor regarding the same.
That’s when you came down to the hospital for a test, you were seen despite the fact that you didn’t have an appointment! In these trying COVID times.
Your subsequent beta hCG was dropping which suggests an abortion or an unhealthy pregnancy. You were informed about it , you didn’t want to accept it that’s why you went dr hopping. 
Next time try internalising rather than externalising the situation. The problem may not always lie with out, it may be within too.
Please appreciate the fact that hospital staff are risking their lives and that of their family to serve you, like you they too could have stayed home. 
You need to grow up beta.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: As the name suggests..an extraordinary doctor - a surgeon blessed with magical hands - epitome of patience and understanding - totally patience centric thought process - thankyou for taking good care of me - I am extremely grateful.

A doctor should give comfort when things are sour. I reached out to 2 more gynaecologists after her *** ***** ******* ** *** ******* *** ********** ********** They specified there was nothing to worry about and things were normal.

The receptionists are friendly and well versed. I would highly recommend oma clinic and Dr Tanuja.

Also doesnt prescribe unnecessary meds and tests. The facility is quite well maintained.. Very thankful to her and the staff at Oma for safely bringing our bundle of joy into this world.

review:
Highly recommended!!!

I met her after consulting 2 gynaecologists in chembur and my hunt for good gynaec finally over when I met her.
She is soft spoken and knowledgeable. I wish I could have met her earlier but never the less we get to know the importance only when we have prior bad experiences. I am very much happy and will be continuing with her. 

Highly recommended!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We had to abort i my 1st pregnancy due to abormillities in fetus, this is our second pregancy. We were nervous but after meeting Dr tanuja We became more positive towards preganancy. She was very informative and friendly in her explanations in regards the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had met many doctors before this meeting. I have to say that I was so happy to meet dr Tanuja inspite of knowing that I maybe having minimal chances  She's so down to earth and sweet. In short, I wish I had met her earlier. She tries all the ways to make sure you are important to her whatever the case maybe. Love you Doc God bless you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
The doctor is fantastic and Ive been going to her and her treatment definitely helps. She is also very nice, understanding and truly cares for her patients. 

But cant say the same about the staff. There is a minimum wait time of at least 2 hours each time. The staff handling appointments are not very friendly or concerned about the people waiting there or what their issues are. No value for patient timings.  

There is a major dissonance in the way she cares vs how her staff cares.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Well it's the best experience with doctor for treatment..
But there is a huge waiting line I think they should improve with time if somebdy has a 7 pm appointment the number of the patient should come somewhere around that time..
But have to wait till 9pm for the number to come.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
